args: require('http').createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}); res.end(JSON.stringify({message: 'Context7 MCP Server', version: '1.0.0', features: ['documentation-search', 'code-examples', 'library-integration', 'api-docs', 'tutorials']})); }).listen(3001);
context7.description: Context7 MCP Server for documentation search, code examples, library integration, API docs, and tutorials

args: require('http').createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}); res.end(JSON.stringify({message: 'GitHub MCP Server', version: '1.0.0', features: ['repository-management', 'issue-tracking', 'pull-request-management', 'code-search', 'user-management']})); }).listen(3002);
github.description: GitHub MCP Server for repository management, issue tracking, pull requests, code search, and user management
